name: Family Balls
description:
Save a family of balls by solving riddles and passing levels. Only with your help, the family will reunite.
Draw lines, press buttons, collect stars! Use your wit and find non-standard solutions.
Enjoy great graphics and pleasant music. Different game worlds and exciting design of the levels.

- Amazing places and vivid characters.
- Different ways to pass the level - find the best one.
- Easy to understand, interesting to find the best way.
- Regular updates with new levels.
- Try the full version of game for free.
